Header: Grade 01 admissions to begin on the 16th
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) â€“ The Ministry of Education confirmed that admission of Grade 01 students begins on the 16th of January . A circular has been issued to all school principals specifying the necessary instructions. The parents of the children who do not receive a school are requested to inform the respective Zonal educational directors. Further, the hearing of petitions regarding Grade 01 admission to schools have now been concluded.
